articles.title: Karisma Kapoor's ex-husband Sunjay Kapur dies of heart attack at 53
articles.description: Actor Karisma Kapoor's ex-husband, Sanjay Kapur, died of a heart attack. He was 53.
articles.content:
Actor Karisma Kapoor’s ex-husband, Sunjay Kapur, died at the age of 53 following a heart attack. Sources told India Today, the incident occurred while he was playing polo. Sunjay was currently married to Priya Sachdev.

articles.title: Gut microbes may help in recognizing and treating pancreatic cancer
articles.description: Pancreatic cancer is a severe illness and major challenge in cancer medicine since it is difficult to diagnose, while potential therapies are scarce. A new international cooperation study indicates that in the future pancreatic cancer may be detected at an early stage from gut microbes. Gut microbes may also offer solutions for therapy development.

articles.title: Space station leaks trigger delay to private astronaut mission
articles.description: The ageing International Space Station is due to be retired by 2030. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
Small cracks on the ISS in recent years, particularly on the ageing Russian segment, mean the ISS will be retired by 2030. PHOTO: REUTERS

articles.title: A stress memory effect in olivine at upper mantle pressures and temperatures
articles.description: The Kaiser effect, which is known as a stress memory effect, predicts that seismic events occur only when the previous maximum stress is exceeded. Therefore, the Kaiser effect has been applied for the estimation of the magnitude of "in situ" stress on crustal rocks in the community of geotechnical engineering (including forecasting earthquakes).
